tool_description: Analyzes potential interactions between multiple medications and provides severity ratings and clinical recommendations.

primary_drug.description: Name of the primary drug being prescribed

include_supplements.description: Whether to check interactions with supplements and over-the-counter medications

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity level to report: mild, moderate, or severe

error_messages: Invalid medication name: One or more medication names are not recognized. Verify all drug names.
Interaction database unavailable: Cannot access drug interaction database. Try again later.
Invalid severity threshold: Use 'mild', 'moderate', or 'severe' for severity_threshold.
Too many medications: Maximum 50 medications can be checked at once. Reduce the list size.
usage: Provide the primary_drug and list of existing_medications. Optionally adjust severity_threshold and include_supplements based on clinical needs.

overall_risk_level.description: Overall risk assessment: low, moderate, high, or critical
